mapper.insert: insert into StockInfo( id , stockCode , stockName , stockType , canRecharge , canWithdraw , canTrade , canBorrow , canConversion , canWealth , isExchange, isActive, tradeStockinfoId, capitalStockinfoId, tradeDebitTotal, capitalDebitTotal, clearStockinfoId, quotationStockinfoId, tradeAmtUnit, tradeAmtSymbol, capitalAmtUnit, capitalAmtSymbol, assetAmtUnit, assetAmtSymbol, clearAmtUnit, clearAmtSymbol, maxLongLever , maxShortLever , maxLongLeverSwitch , maxShortLeverSwitch , maxLongFuse, maxShortFuse, buyMaxLimitPriceUpPercent, buyMaxLimitPriceDownPercent, buyMinLimitPriceUpPercent, buyMinLimitPriceDownPercent, sellMaxLimitPriceUpPercent, sellMaxLimitPriceDownPercent, sellMinLimitPriceUpPercent, sellMinLimitPriceDownPercent, buyPricePrecision, buyAmountPrecision, buyMinAmount, sellPricePrecision, sellAmountPrecision, sellMinAmount, maxSingleBuyEntrustAmt , maxSingleSellEntrustAmt , closePositionLongPrePercent, closePositionShortPrePercent, digitBorrowDayRate, legalBorrowDayRate, wealthDayRate, tableWealthCurrent, tableAsset, tableDebitAsset, tableDebitAssetDetail, tableEntrust, tableEntrustHis, tableRealDeal, tableRealDealHis, tableFundCurrent, tableFundCurrentHis, tableQuotationKline, webSocketUrl, topicKline1m, topicKline5m, topicKline15m, topicKline30m, topicKlineHour, topicKlineDay, topicKlineWeek, topicKlineMonth, topicEntrustDeepprice, topicRealdealTransaction, topicRtquotationPrice, openEntrustType, settlementCycle , settlementPrice , settlementStep , entrustAccumDenom, tokenContactAddr, tokenDecimals, unauthUserWithdrawDayUpper, authedUserWithdrawDayUpper, smallWithdrawHotSignValue, smallDepositFeeValue, smallDepositStandardValue, remark , createBy , createDate , updateBy , updateDate ) VALUES ( #{id} , #{stockCode} , #{stockName} , #{stockType} , #{canRecharge} , #{canWithdraw} , #{canTrade} , #{canBorrow} , #{canConversion}, #{canWealth}, #{isExchange}, #{isActive}, #{tradeStockinfoId}, #{capitalStockinfoId}, #{tradeDebitTotal}, #{capitalDebitTotal}, #{clearStockinfoId}, #{quotationStockinfoId}, #{tradeAmtUnit}, #{tradeAmtSymbol}, #{capitalAmtUnit}, #{capitalAmtSymbol}, #{assetAmtUnit}, #{assetAmtSymbol}, #{clearAmtUnit}, #{clearAmtSymbol}, #{maxLongLever} , #{maxShortLever} , #{maxLongLeverSwitch} , #{maxShortLeverSwitch} , #{maxLongFuse} , #{maxShortFuse} , #{buyMaxLimitPriceUpPercent} , #{buyMaxLimitPriceDownPercent} , #{buyMinLimitPriceUpPercent} , #{buyMinLimitPriceDownPercent} , #{sellMaxLimitPriceUpPercent} , #{sellMaxLimitPriceDownPercent} , #{sellMinLimitPriceUpPercent} , #{sellMinLimitPriceDownPercent} , #{buyPricePrecision} , #{buyAmountPrecision} , #{buyMinAmount} , #{sellPricePrecision} , #{sellAmountPrecision} , #{sellMinAmount} , #{maxSingleBuyEntrustAmt} , #{maxSingleSellEntrustAmt} , #{closePositionLongPrePercent}, #{closePositionShortPrePercent}, #{digitBorrowDayRate}, #{legalBorrowDayRate}, #{wealthDayRate}, #{tableWealthCurrent}, #{tableAsset}, #{tableDebitAsset}, #{tableDebitAssetDetail}, #{tableEntrust}, #{tableEntrustHis}, #{tableRealDeal}, #{tableRealDealHis}, #{tableFundCurrent}, #{tableFundCurrentHis}, #{tableQuotationKline}, #{webSocketUrl}, #{topicKline1m}, #{topicKline5m}, #{topicKline15m}, #{topicKline30m}, #{topicKlineHour}, #{topicKlineDay}, #{topicKlineWeek}, #{topicKlineMonth}, #{topicEntrustDeepprice}, #{topicRealdealTransaction}, #{topicRtquotationPrice}, #{openEntrustType}, #{settlementCycle} , #{settlementPrice} , #{settlementStep} , #{entrustAccumDenom}, #{tokenContactAddr}, #{tokenDecimals}, #{unauthUserWithdrawDayUpper}, #{authedUserWithdrawDayUpper}, #{smallWithdrawHotSignValue}, #{smallDepositFeeValue}, #{smallDepositStandardValue}, #{remark} , #{createBy} , #{createDate} , #{updateBy} , #{updateDate} )

mapper.select:
select
from StockInfo a where a.id = #{id}
select from ( select * from StockInfo a where a.tokenContactAddr is null and a.stocktype='pureSpot' and a.isactive!='yes' order by a.id asc ) a where rownum=1

SELECT
FROM StockInfo a left join UserInfo b on a.createBy = b.id left join UserInfo c on a.updateBy = c.id where a.isActive='yes'

SELECT
FROM StockInfo a where 1=1 and a.isActive='yes'
and a.id in
#{item}

SELECT
FROM StockInfo a where 1=1 and a.isActive='yes'
and a.stockType in
#{item}
